actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on polyisocyanate cross linking agent products containing tripehnylmethane triisocyanate in solvents.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description of polyisocyanate cross linking agent products containing triphenylmethane triisocyanate in solvents, and (2) extend temporarily the suspension of duty on such article.

titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on polyisocyanate cross linking agent products containing tripehnylmethane triisocyanate in solvents.
A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on polyisocyanate cross linking agent products containing tripehnylmethane triisocyanate in solvents.
